mapper.insert: insert into community_post (type_id, theme_id, post_subject, post_content, post_images, post_files, post_viewcnt, post_cmtcnt, post_likecnt, user_id, post_created_at, post_updated_at) values (#{type_id}, #{theme_id}, #{post_subject}, #{post_content}, #{post_images}, #{post_files}, #{post_viewcnt}, #{post_cmtcnt}, #{post_likecnt}, #{user_id}, #{post_created_at}, #{post_updated_at})
mapper.update: update community_post set post_viewcnt = post_viewcnt + 1 where post_id = #{post_id}
mapper.select: select count(post_id) from (select * from community_post where post_subject like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or post_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) as a
